item.title: Apprentice Butcher (Level 3)
item.description: Performed an interactive rebase using git rebase -i.

item.title: Socialite (Level 6)
item.description: pushed a branch to a remote repository using git push

item.title: Traveler (Level 5)
item.description: Streamed changes between another rcs with git svn or git p4.

item.description: Fetches named heads or tags from another repository with git fetch

item.description: Forced pushed a branch with git push -f

item.description: Forced pushed a branch with git push -f

item.description: Stash the changes in a dirty working directory away with git stash.
